__NOTOC__{{DISPLAYTITLE: A_OverlayAlpha}} '''A_OverlayAlpha''' (int ''layer'', double ''alph'')
== Usage == Sets the alpha of the overlay specified. Requires [[A_OverlayFlags]]' PSPF_ALPHA set to true to have any effect.
== Parameters == *''layer'' - The layer to modify. *''alph'' - The alpha for the layer to have.
== Examples == {{noexamples}} == See Also == *[[A_Overlay]] *[[A_OverlayOffset]] *[[A_OverlayFlags]] *[[A_OverlayRenderstyle]] *[[A_WeaponOffset]]
{{DEFAULTSORT:OverlayAlpha}}[[category:Decorate Weapon functions]]
